name: Winter’s Gift
description:
A short horror story about a girl named Winter. Made in three days as part of Game Dev Unlocked - Game Jam #3. Takes a few minutes to play.

Game controls

Works best with keyboard and mouse. A gamepad might work.

MoveW,A,S,D LookMouse About the project

This game was made during the Game Dev Unlocked - Game Jam #3. The theme was Winter. This was my first time participating in a game jam and I quickly realized how little you can do in a short amount of time. I'm happy with what this ended up being despite its very short play time. I hope you enjoy it! 

My creative goal was to make a short creepy story with a holiday theme. My technical goals were to learn the following about Unreal Engine: UI, music, sound, modifying animation, and packaging. Let me know if you find any bugs or have issues running this on your computer. I know there is more I can learn from this project.

If you feel inclined to toss any coins my way, rest assured they'll be used to fund future games.

To follow along and learn about new games, you can find me at: https://twitter.com/geoffa
